products.title: Watercolour Stripe Ochre Roman Blind
products.description: Watercolour stripe ochre does everything it says on the tin and so much more. Inspired by designer clarissa hulse's extensive travels, each stripe travelling across the fabric creates its own landscape to produce a stunningly varied effect. The colours are both vibrant and intens watercolour stripe ochre does everything it says on the tin and so much more.

products.title: Guarda Stripe, Ochre - Roman Blind
products.description: A summery combination of ochre yellow, sunny lemon, and soft dove grey, the stripes of the guarda stripe in ochre sit casually on a creamy white background and the outcome is soft and appealing, perfect for the modern home. Brighten up your kitchen by teaming the ochre with cream units and yellow walls. Choose appliances, utensils, and tea towels in matching greys and yellows, and keep wooden furniture light and contemporary.

products.title: Watercolour Stripe Ochre Roller Blind
products.description: Mustard and grey is the classic combination and it's never looked more beautiful as it does in this watercolour stripe design based on a handpainted original by the inimitable clarissa hulse.
